field.name: Soothe Throat and Relieve Cough | Counseling
Counsel mother/caregiver to give safe remedies
Safe remedies can be homemade, for example warm water mixed with honey, tea, warm soups, and warm lemon drinks, and can be as effective as those bought in a store
When explaining how to give the safe remedy, it is not necessary to watch the mother practise giving the remedy to the child
Exact dosing is not important with this treatment
If child is exclusively breastfed, child does not need to take other drinks or remedies. Breast milk is the best soothing remedy for an exclusively breastfed child
